name: @jakzo/aoc
description: CLI for reading, running and submitting Advent of Code challenges.
author: Jack Field

scripts.lint:fix: project && eslint --cache --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx ./ --fix && prettier -c "./**/*{.json,.md}" --write && run-if-script-exists lint:fix:custom
scripts.lint: project && eslint --cache --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx ./ && prettier -c "./**/*{.json,.md}" && run-if-script-exists lint:custom
scripts.build: project && run-if-script-exists build:custom-before && tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json && run-if-script-exists build:custom
scripts.test:all: project && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json --noEmit && eslint --cache --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx ./ && prettier -c "./**/*{.json,.md}" && run-if-script-exists lint:custom && jest --passWithNoTests && run-if-script-exists test:custom
scripts.release: project && rimraf "./dist" *.tsbuildinfo && run-if-script-exists build:clean:custom && run-if-script-exists build:custom-before && tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json && run-if-script-exists build:custom && changeset publish && run-if-script-exists release:custom
